quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.summary: China Technology Industry Group Ltd is an investment holding company principally engaged in the sales of renewable energy products. The Company operates its business through two segments. The Sales of Renewable Energy Products segment is engaged in the research, development, sales of photovoltaic mounting brackets, solar trackers, guardrails of solar power stations, solar power related products, and towers for wind turbines. It also provides technology consultation services with respect to the photovoltaic mounting brackets, on-site services and technical services for the wind turbine towers products. The New Energy Power System Integration Services segment is engaged in the contractor of new power station projects, integrate equipment, functions and information into a connected, unified and coordinated system. This segment also makes project design proposals, conducts site visits, procures construction materials, carries out construction work, and assists in operation trials.
